required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: GRAVITAS-309: Itacitinib and Corticosteroids as Initial Treatment for Chronic Graft-Versus-Host Disease
clinical_study.official_title: GRAVITAS-309: A Phase 2/3 Study of Itacitinib and Corticosteroids as Initial Treatment for Chronic Graft-Versus-Host Disease

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to assess the efficacy and safety of itacitinib in combination with corticosteroids as first-line treatment for moderate or severe chronic graft-versus-host disease (cGVHD).

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: In Part 2 of the study, participants in the placebo group will be allowed to cross over to the experimental group after completion of the primary analysis.

primary_outcome.measure: Part 1 : Dose Determination: Number of dose-limiting toxicities
primary_outcome.description: To identify an appropriate dose of itacitinib in combination with corticosteroids as initial treatment for moderate or severe cGVHD.
Defined as the proportion of participants demonstrating a complete response (CR) or partial response (PR) per National Institutes of Health (NIH) consensus guideline.

primary_outcome.measure: Part 1 : Dose Expansion: Number of dose-limiting toxicities
primary_outcome.description: To identify an appropriate dose of itacitinib in combination with corticosteroids as initial treatment for moderate or severe cGVHD.

secondary_outcome.measure: Part 1, 1 expansion, and Part 2: Cmax of itacitinib when administered in combination with corticosteroids
Part 1, 1 expansion, and Part 2: Cmin of itacitinib when administered in combination with corticosteroids
secondary_outcome.description: Minimum observed plasma or serum concentration over the dose interval.

other_outcome.measure: Part 1, 1 expansion, and Part 2: Response rate
other_outcome.description: Defined as the proportion of participants who demonstrate a CR or PR per NIH consensus guideline.
Defined as the interval between randomization and first response.

other_outcome.measure: Part 1, 1 expansion, and Part 2: Duration of response
other_outcome.description: Defined as the interval between first response and cGVHD progression, death, malignancy relapse, or initiation of new systemic cGVHD therapy.

other_outcome.measure: Part 1, 1 expansion, and Part 2: Overall survival
other_outcome.description: Defined as the interval between the date of randomization and the date of death due to any cause.

other_outcome.measure: Part 1, 1 expansion, and Part 2: Nonrelapse mortality
other_outcome.description: Defined as the proportion of participants who died due to causes other than malignancy relapse.

other_outcome.measure: Part 2: Number of treatment-emergent adverse events
other_outcome.description: Defined as adverse events reported for the first time or worsening of a pre-existing event after first dose of study drug/treatment).

arm_group.description: itacitinib administered in combination with corticosteroids.
itacitinib administered in combination with corticosteroids or corticosteroids alone.

arm_group.arm_group_label: Part 2 : itacitinib recommended dose from part 1
arm_group.description: itacitinib or placebo administered in combination with corticosteroids

intervention.description: In Part 1dose determination participants will receive itacitinib administered orally once daily at the protocol-defined dose according to cohort enrollment. In Part 1 expansion, participants will receive either itacitinib administered orally either once daily or twice a day or corticosteroid alone based on the assigned treatment regimen according to cohort enrollment. In Part 2, participants will receive the recommended dose from Part 1 expansion.
intervention.arm_group_label: Part 2 : itacitinib recommended dose from part 1

intervention.description: In Part 2, participants will receive matching placebo.
Administered in Parts 1 and 2 as background reference therapy at a dose level that is commensurate with institutional guidelines based on organ involvement and severity of disease.
intervention.arm_group_label: Part 2 : itacitinib recommended dose from part 1

intervention.description: Administered in Parts 1 and 2 as background reference therapy at a dose level that is commensurate with institutional guidelines based on organ involvement and severity of disease.
intervention.arm_group_label: Part 2 : itacitinib recommended dose from part 1
intervention.other_name: Deltasone, Prednicot, predniSONE Intensol, Rayos, Sterapred, Sterapred DS

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Active, clinically diagnosed, moderate or severe cGVHD per NIH Consensus Criteria
- Underwent allogeneic stem cell transplantation (allo-HCT)
- Karnofsky Performance Status score â‰¥ 60%.
- Evidence of myeloid and platelet engraftment.
- Willingness to avoid pregnancy or fathering children based on protocol-defined criteria.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Has received more than 3 days/72 hours of systemic corticosteroid treatment for cGVHD.
- Has received any other systemic treatment for cGVHD, including extracorporeal photopheresis (ECP).
- Prior treatment with a Janus kinase (JAK) inhibitor for acute GVHD, unless the participant achieved complete or partial response and has been off JAK inhibitor treatment for at least 8 weeks before randomization.
- cGVHD occurring after a nonscheduled donor lymphocyte infusion (DLI) administered for pre-emptive treatment of malignancy recurrence.
- Evidence of relapsed primary malignancy.
